name: South Pole Bebop
storyline:
In the icy expanse of Antarctica, a once serene village finds itself besieged by an unholy horde of zombies unleashed by a clandestine AI organization from the heart of The South Pole itself. But the mystery deepens: from whence do these fiendish creatures arise? Could it be that unsuspecting villagers fall victim to the zombie plague, transforming into undead assailants themselves? As the last hope for salvation, the fate of the village rests squarely upon your shoulders.

Embark on an epic journey alongside Mahana, the resilient penguin, and Sealprano, the courageous seal, as well as a host of other brave denizens of the South Pole, as you rally to repel the invaders and safeguard your homes, your loved ones, and the very essence of your community.
summary:
A multiplayer Into The Breach-inspired turn-based strategy game. It is designed for two players, is set on a 9x9 board where each player controls characters and bases. Each player commands three characters and three bases, aiming to eliminate the opponent's characters or bases while fending off a zombie horde that attacks both players.

Players can create a customizable deck before each game, consisting of three characters and up to 15 unique ability cards that enhance bases and provide special powers to characters. During gameplay, players can purchase ability cards using collectable cores. These cards are limited to those included in the player's deck, which can be modified and reused for subsequent games.
